title: Subject to the foregoing provisions, only the actual occupants of the hutments shall be treated as eligible for rehabilitation under the S
clause_text: Subject to the foregoing provisions, only the actual occupants of the hutments shall be treated as eligible for rehabilitation under the S.R.S. and any person claiming ownership of such structure who is not the actual occupant of the same, shall have no right whatsoever to allotment of rehabilitation tenement.
section: Provision relating to allotment of tenements either in situ or otherwise, on ownership or on rent to the other non-protected occupiers

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
